rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or alert phrases.
The segment discusses future actions ('will continue') without a moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This reports planned action, not explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment describes continued testing but contains no bare negation.
Describes ongoing surveillance/response measure ('Testing of the control-area farms will continue') without active reassurance.
